abstract: Sales of women’s clothing, a traditional pillar of the holiday shopping season, are unusually weak so far this year, according to a major credit card company.
snippet: Sales of women’s clothing, a traditional pillar of the holiday shopping season, are unusually weak so far this year, according to a major credit card company.
lead_paragraph: Sales of women’s clothing, a traditional pillar of the holiday shopping season, are unusually bleak so far this year, according to a major credit card company, an ominous sign for the retail industry.

headline.main: Retailers Face an Ominous Holiday Sign
headline.print_headline: Women’s Clothing Sales, Sign of Retail Health, Are Unusually Weak
